Author: Birdie49
Text: Oh! I had no idea about that! That actually makes me feel a lot better -- hopefully if I continue to eat a bit more it'll return to normal with time. Thank you so much!

Author: x24throwaway
Text: My dermatologist explained this to me. From memory it was something like â€” Your hair is on a roughly 3 month cycle. So if 3ish months ago, you were eating a poor diet (or really physically or mentally stressed etc.), then your hair might start falling out now.
